title: GNOME Shell and Mutter 45.1 Released with Xwayland and Wayland Improvements
description:
GNOME Shell 45.1 and Mutter 45.1 are now available with better Xwayland and Wayland support, as well as various improvements and fixes for bugs and crashes.

The post GNOME Shell and Mutter 45.1 Released with Xwayland and Wayland Improvements appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Fwupd 1.9.7 Adds Support for More Synaptics Prometheus Fingerprint Readers
description:
Fwupd 1.9.7 Linux firmware updating utility is now available with support for more Synaptics Prometheus fingerprint readers, Logitech Rally system devices, some Western Digital eMMC devices, and other devices.

The post Fwupd 1.9.7 Adds Support for More Synaptics Prometheus Fingerprint Readers appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (Noble Numbat) Daily Build ISOs Are Now Available for Download
description:
Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (Noble Numbat) daily build ISO images are now available to download for early adopters and application developers who want to test drive their apps against the new toolchain.

The post Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (Noble Numbat) Daily Build ISOs Are Now Available for Download appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
